channel.title: How to make an item not sell-able (317, rep++)
channel.description: Hi, im working on my game right now and im trying to make it so I can't sell my yew long bows to the store, (67) because I just want people to alch them instead. I have already tried adding them to the donator items in the item.java file but with no luck they can still be sold to stores. Any help here? I haven't really ever done much with item selling and buying in 317's

item.title: How to make an item not sell-able (317, rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:5, topic:370585”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=466688.msg3412822#msg3412822 date=1290833443]

Hi, im working on my game right now and im trying to make it so I can’t sell my yew long bows to the store, (67) because I just want people to alch them instead. I have already tried adding them to the donator items in the item.java file but with no luck they can still be sold to stores. Any help here? I haven’t really ever done much with item selling and buying in 317’s

In delta, add the item id to the NoTrade array

in PI,

its in config.java
public static final int[] ITEM_TRADEABLE

add it to that array
[/quote]
lol thats basicly what i just said but you spoonfed him[/quote]

Not really lol,

its not in the item.java either

And why is it that whenever someone needs help, its considered spoonfeeding them to help?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an item not sell-able (317, rep++)

item.title: How to make an item not sell-able (317, rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:5, topic:370585”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=466688.msg3412822#msg3412822 date=1290833443]

Hi, im working on my game right now and im trying to make it so I can’t sell my yew long bows to the store, (67) because I just want people to alch them instead. I have already tried adding them to the donator items in the item.java file but with no luck they can still be sold to stores. Any help here? I haven’t really ever done much with item selling and buying in 317’s

In delta, add the item id to the NoTrade array

in PI,

its in config.java
public static final int[] ITEM_TRADEABLE

add it to that array
[/quote]
lol thats basicly what i just said but you spoonfed him[/quote]
Nope, because you said items.java, I stated in my post that I already tried in there and it failed.

Read full topic
